title: As an AMT User, I want to see a warning if the profile I am entering in AMT already exists in ebis
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user logged in 
AND user try to create already exists player in ebis in AMT
custom_steps: WHEN user click Next on the create new player page
custom_expected:
THEN the system will run a duplicate check against profiles in ebis, in accordance with the logic provided in the matching story
AND Intl Suspect profiles won't be matched against or returned as potential duplicates
AND If potential duplicates are found, they will be presented in a modal
AND The modal will match provided Wire and data discovery
AND If the user selects one of the matching profiles, that profile will be loaded in View Mode
AND If the user clicks "No, continue creating prospect," a new profile will be loaded in edit mode
AND If the profile exists in ebis, user will be able to select the profile, load it, check it in, or save it as Draft.

Wire:
Soft Match: https://zpl.io/V1w9GRk
Hard Match: https://zpl.io/2ZknENq

Messages:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/AMT+-+Messages

title: As an AMT User, I want AMT profiles to be properly mapped to the corresponding ebis profile following a merge
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC or Club user logged in
AND user is merging two player profile
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks merge
custom_expected:
THEN profiles are merged in ebis, all already existing ebis merge rules will be followed
AND When the merge is complete, the new ebisID will be sent to AMT
AND The corresponding AMT profiles will be updated to have the common ebisID

title: Global UI Updates
custom_steps:
AC:
- Remove the underline on hover from links globally
- Use the EBIS AMT logo on the Top Nav
- Fix the weird scroll that happens when the mobile nav is open.  You can see the content scrolling where the white subnav use to be.(Can't see this anymore with the dev banner, but would likely still be a problem on prod) 
- The box-shadow of the top nav should be visible on the mobile nav
- Clicking on a link in the mobile nav should close the mobile nav and navigate to the page

title: As a Club AMT User, I want to view players currently checked into my academy on a tablet
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://zpl.io/brEqZvr
https://zpl.io/b6vRyJR
https://zpl.io/VQELqoR

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Prospects+Page

AC:
 - The Prospects Page will feature a table of players
 - The table will match the provided wire and data discovery
 - When the dashboard is first loaded, the table will default to the status filter being set to "Checked In"
 - If the user changes the status filter, clicking the "Checked In" filter will reload the table to show all players with a status of Checked In
 - If no players have a status of Checked In, the table will be blank

title: As an AMT user I want all focused field styling to be the same

Currently there seems to be 2 different ways of styling a field in focus.  See attached. 

AC:

title: As an AMT User, I want add a potential match to my current period prospect list
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://zpl.io/V1w9GRk
https://zpl.io/2ZknENq

Icon:
https://fontawesome.com/icons/user-plus?style=solid

AC:
- When viewing the potential match message, there will be an add to prospect list icon, as depicted in the provided wire
- Add the title attribute to the icon so on hover a browser tooltip appears saying "Add to current Prospect list"
- If the player is already on the club's prospect list for the current period, the icon will not appear in the matching message
- Clicking the icon will add the prospect to the club's prospect list for the current period
- There will be a success message ("Prospect added to current prospects list")
- The screen will refresh and the user will be returned to the Create New dashboard
- The player will appear for the club on their prospects dashboard
- If the player has never been checked in by the club, the player will appear with a status of Draft

title: As an AMT User, I want my current period prospect list to only show prospects that have been added during the current period

Icon:
https://fontawesome.com/icons/user-plus?style=solid

AC:
- When viewing the Prospects dashboard, only players that have been added to the current period's list are visible. 
- The two periods available are 1/1 to 7/1 and 7/2 to 12/31.

- When viewing the potential match message, there will be an add to prospect list icon, as depicted in the provided wire

- If the player is already on the club's prospect list for the current period, the icon will not appear in the matching message

title: As an AMT User, I want adding a prospect from ebis to my current period prospect list to create a profile in AMT
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://zpl.io/V1w9GRk
https://zpl.io/2ZknENq

Icon:
https://fontawesome.com/icons/user-plus?style=solid

AC:
- When viewing the potential match message, there will be an add to prospect list icon, as depicted in the provided wire
- Add the title attribute to the icon so on hover a browser tooltip appears saying "Add to current Prospect list"
- If the player is already on the club's prospect list for the current period, the icon will not appear in the matching message
- If the player being displayed as a match is an ebis player and does not yet have a profile in AMT for the viewing Club, clicking the icon will automatically create a new Prospect profile and add the prospect to the club's prospect list for the current period
- There will be a success message ("Prospect added to current prospects list")
- The screen will refresh and the user will be returned to the Create New dashboard
- The player will appear for the club on their prospects dashboard
- The new prospect profile is created for the player and is tied to the proper ebis ID
- The player will appear with a status of Draft

title: As an AMT Club User, I want to create a new travel authorization form
custom_steps:
Wire:
Profile: https://zpl.io/29ygDKW
Form: https://zpl.io/adPMAEK

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Travel+Authorization+Form

AC:
 - When viewing a prospect's profile, there will be a "Request Travel Authorization" button at the bottom as depicted
 - Clicking the button will open a new Travel Authorization Form
 - The new form will be in edit mode
 - The form will match the provided wire and data discovery

title: As an AMT Club User, I want to save a new travel authorization form
custom_steps:
Wire:
Form: https://zpl.io/adPMAEK
Club Widget: https://zpl.io/2pldoL8

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Travel+Authorization+Form

AC:
* A Save button will be available anytime the form is in edit mode. 
* Clicking Save will run a required field and formatting check. 
* If the required field and format check passes, then the current values are stored, and the system reloads the profile in view mode. 
* After a successful save the system will display a green notification. "Travel Authorization Form saved"
* Whenever the form is in edit mode, the user will see a "Cancel" button on the form in grey.
* Saving a new Form, prior to submitting it, will give the Form a status of "Preliminary"
* Saved Forms will appear in the Club's Travel Forms widget

title: As an AMT Club User, I want to submit a new travel authorization form
custom_steps:
Wire
Form: https://zpl.io/adPMAEK
Club Widget: https://zpl.io/2pldoL8
BOC Widget: https://zpl.io/VD4ODMg

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Travel+Authorization+Form

AC:
- When the Travel Form is in edit mode, Club Users will see a Submit button at the bottom of the form
- The button will appear on unsaved or preliminary Travel Forms
- Clicking Submit will run a required field and formatting check per the data discovery 
- Once the form has passed the required field and formatting checks, if the form was in edit mode, it is reloaded in view mode
- The Form's status will update to Submitted, which will also be reflected on the Club's Travel Forms widget
- The Form will now appear on the BOC's Travel Forms widget, show the status of submitted
- A green success notification will be displayed

title: As an AMT Club User, I want to delete a travel authorization form
custom_steps:
Wire
Form: https://zpl.io/adPMAEK

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Travel+Authorization+Form

AC:
- When the Travel Form is in Preliminary State and in Edit Mode, there will be a Delete button at the bottom of the page
- Clicking Delete will prompt the user to confirm that they wish to delete the form from the system.
**Title:** Warning
**Body:** Are you sure you want to delete this Form?
**Hint:** This is a permanent action that cannot be undone.
**Buttons:** Yes, No
- If they confirm the deletion, then the form should be closed and no record should be kept. User should be returned to their entry point (either the prospect's profile or the Travel Forms widget)
- If they do not confirm the deletion, then they should be returned to the form and no action should be taken.

title: As an AMT Club User, I want to View the Travel Authorization Forms Widget
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://zpl.io/2pldoL8

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Travel+Forms+-+Club

AC:
 - When a Club User is viewing the "Travel Forms" dashboard, the club version of the Travel Forms widget will be displayed
 - The widget will match the provided wire and data discovery
 - The widget will be populated with all travel forms the club has created in the past 12 months (they will not see other Clubs' forms)
  -- Anything created more than 12 month ago will roll off and only be available through Advanced Search
 - The widget will default sort descending by Submission Date with all Preliminary Forms appearing at the top of the list
 - There will be a Status filter in the header
 - There will be a type to search filter in the header
 - Clicking on a column header will sort the widget
 - The widget will be exportable to Excel, when it's exported it will retain any applied filters

title: As an AMT BOC User, I want to View the Travel Authorization Forms Widget
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://zpl.io/VD4ODMg

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Travel+Forms+-+BOC

AC:
 - When a BOC User is viewing the "Travel Forms" dashboard, the BOC version of the Travel Forms widget will be displayed
 - The widget will match the provided wire and data discovery
 - The widget will be populated with all travel forms submitted by clubs in the past 12 months
  -- Anything created more than 12 months ago will roll off and only be available through Advanced Search
 - The widget will default sort descending by Submission Date
 - There will be a Status filter in the header
  -- The Status filter will default to Submitted
 - There will be an Org filter in the header
 - There will be a type to search filter in the header
 - Double clicking on a column header will resort the widget
 - The widget will be exportable to Excel, when it's exported it will retain any applied filters

 - If the checkbox is NOT checked, Comments will not be visible

title: As an AMT BOC User, I want to Approve a Travel Authorization Form
custom_steps:
Wire:

AC:

 - A green success notification will be thrown "Approved"
 - The new status will be reflected on the submitting Club's Travel Forms widget
 - The Form will roll off the BOC's Travel Forms widget

title: As an AMT BOC User, I want to Reject a Travel Authorization Form

 - The new status will be reflected on both the submitting Club's and the BOC's Travel Forms widget

title: As an AMT User, I want adding a prospect from ebis to my current period prospect list to redirect me to the new profile so I can update some of the information
custom_steps:
Wire:
Soft Match: https://zpl.io/V1w9GRk
Hard Match: https://zpl.io/2ZknENq

Icon:
https://fontawesome.com/icons/user-plus?style=solid

AC:
- When viewing the potential match message, there will be an add to prospect list icon, as depicted in the provided wire
- Clicking the icon for a player that does not yet have a profile for the viewing Club in AMT will redirect the user to a new profile page, with the following fields prepopulated from ebis, and uneditable: 
 - First Name
 - Middle Name
 - Last Name
 - Extended Last Name
 - Birth Date
 - Birth Country
 - Birth State
 - Birth City
 - Country of Reisdence
 - EBIS ID
 - National ID Country
 - Number (Cedula)  
- The position fields, and Trainer information fields will be editable
- IF the ebis profile has trainer information that has been entered by the creating Org, then it is pre-populated but remains editable. If the trainer information is for any other Org, it will not display in AMT. 
- When the user saves the profile, there will be a success message ("Prospect added to current prospects list")
- The screen will refresh and the user will be returned to the Create New dashboard
- The player will appear for the club on their prospects dashboard
- The player will appear with a status of Draft

New AC:
- The submit button is disabled until 1 checkbox is checked.
- Rows that are selected will have selected styling

- When the Travel Form is in edit mode, Club Users will see a Submit button at the bottom of the form
- The button will appear on unsaved or preliminary Travel Forms
- Clicking Submit will run a required field and formatting check per the data discovery 
- Once the form has passed the required field and formatting checks, if the form was in edit mode, it is reloaded in view mode
- The Form's status will update to Submitted, which will also be reflected on the Club's Travel Forms widget
- The Form will now appear on the BOC's Travel Forms widget, show the status of submitted
- A green success notification will be displayed

title: AMT Profile Permissions
custom_steps:
- Club Users are able to search and load prospect profiles that they have entered
  -- This includes new profiles or matching profiles they have selected
 - When a club is viewing the profile of a player that has been checked in by other clubs, they will not see other clubs' check in information
 - When a club is viewing the profile of a player that has been checked in by other clubs, they will not see other clubs' Travel Authorization information


 - BOC Users are able to search and load all player profiles within AMT
 - When a BOC User is viewing the profile of a player that has been checked in by other clubs, they will see a comprehensive check in history that covers check ins by all clubs
 - When a BOC User is viewing the profile of a player that has been checked in by other clubs, they will see a comprehensive Travel Authorization history that covers forms created by all clubs

title: As an AMT BOC User, I want to Approve a Travel Authorization Form from the Travel Forms widget
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://zpl.io/VD4ODMg

AC:
 - When viewing Travel Forms widget, BOC users will see an inactive Approve button
 - After selecting one or more Travel Forms by using the checkboxes, the Approve button will become active
 - Selected rows will have active styling per the wireframe
 - Clicking the Approve button will update the status of the selected form(s) from Submitted to Approved
 - A green notification will be thrown "X Travel Form(s) Approved"
 - The new status will be reflected on the submitting Club's Travel Forms widget
 - The form(s) will roll off the BOC's Travel Forms widget
 - The form(s) will be available through advanced search for the BOC and the submitting club(s)

 - After selecting one or more Travel Forms by using the checkboxes, the Reject button will become active
 - Selected rows will have selected styling per the wireframe
 - Clicking the Reject button will update the status of the selected form(s) from Submitted to Rejected
 - A green notification will be thrown "X Travel Form(s) Rejected"
 - The new status will be reflected on both the submitting Club's and the BOC's Travel Forms widget

title: As a user I want to see a progress spinner when an action is taken in the app
custom_steps:
*AC:*

- MoonLoader http://www.davidhu.io/react-spinners/ MLB Navy: #041e42 over a white overlay with 85% opacity.

title: As a developer (and user) I'd like to see a hover-over on or near the logo area that shows the versions of the backend and frontend code that are running on my system.
custom_steps:
Like EBIS, BATTER and others, I'd like to have a hover over that shows the versions of the front end and backend artifacts, so that I can more effectively debug issues.  

Dan Cody has worked on some reusable code that enables this in best-common-react.   We also have code in BATTER that we can harvest for this as well.

title: As an AMT BOC User, I want to review a club's Checkins This Period from the Clubs Dashboard
custom_steps:
Wire:
Club-Desktop: https://zpl.io/bz1gZeX 
Modal: https://zpl.io/adPeJ5l
Mobile Modal: https://zpl.io/2EPqQme 

AC:
 - On the Clubs Dashboard, "Check Ins This Period" will be a hyperlink
 - Clicking on this link will open a modal
 - The modal will display high level information for each prospect that Club has checked in during the current period
 - The modal will match the prospect wire
 - Clicking a prospect's name will load the prospect's profile
 - Clicking the Close button or the 'X' icon will dismiss the modal

title: As an AMT User, I want to Check In an existing player and enter a Check In Location for a player
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://zpl.io/V0JDDwl

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Check+In

AC:
 - Players with a prospect status of "Draft" or "Checked Out" will have a "Check In" button on the prospect's profile, as depicted in the wire
 - If Spanish language is selected, the button will read "Registro"
 - Clicking the button will launch a Prospect Check-In modal
 - The modal will match the provided data discovery and wire
 - If one of the following Locations are selected, an optional Location Comments box is displayed:
--    DR Off-site
--    VZ Off-site
--    Other Country Off-site
 - If Other Country Off-site is selected as the Location, a required Country drop down will be displayed
 - Clicking the Next button will perform a required field check
  -- If the check passes, the user will be taken to the next screen
  -- If the check passes, the user will be notified of the missing fields

title: As a BOC AMT User, I want to Check In a Player On Behalf of a Club
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://zpl.io/2pn8OqM

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Check+In

AC:
  - BOC Users will see a Check In button on prospect profiles with a status of "Draft" or "Checked Out"
  - Clicking the Check In button will open the Location tab of the Check In modal
  - The BOC's version of this screen will have a "Checking In On Behalf Of:"  dropdown
  - This dropdown will only be populated with with Orgs that have a profile for the player in AMT
  - There will be a Next button and a Cancel button
  - Clicking Cancel will return the user to the prospect's profile
  - Clicking the Next button will take the User to the Location tab of the Check In modal

title: As an AMT User, I want to take a player's picture during Check In
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://zpl.io/V0JDDwl

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Check+In

AC:
 - After the user clicks 'Next' on the Location tab of the Check In modal, they will be taken to the Photo tab
 - The Photo tab will match the provided wire and data discovery
 - There will be a Previous button, that when clicked, will return the user to the Location tab
 - A capture icon will be displayed, as depicted in the wire
 - Pressing the capture icon will capture the image displayed in the preview window
 - After the image has been captured, there will be a Retake button displayed
 - If the Retake button is clicked, the captured image is discarded, and the Capture icon will return
 - When an image is captured, the Next button will become active
